predicate.note: Frames file for 'chasten' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.

example.name: the one example
example.text: Hong Kong manufacturers say large debt writeoffs and other financial problems resulting from the 1987 difficulties chastened the local industry, causing it to tighten credit policies and financial management.
example.arg: large debt writeoffs and other financial problems resulting from the 1987 difficulties
causing it to tighten credit policies and financial management
